Check the position of each Sprite in the SpriteGroup registered in this CollisionDetector, if a Sprite collide with the boundary, the method calls a CollisionAction.

CollidedRadius - Variable in class com.tabuto.j2dgf.Sprite
Max radius of Sprite improve CheckCollision performance; If the distance of two sprite is greater of this value, CheckCollision dosn't check other value.
